item.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 11, 00:00 - 04:00 UTC

Mar 23, 14:54 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/04/2023 00:00 UTC
End time : 11/04/2023 04:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for the customers who have set the aggregation properly (OLA configured).
Otherwise, clients who have not defined the aggregation will have their servers temporarily unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

item.title: VPS - SBG6 - host1293915
item.description:
Mar 28, 11:09 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host1293915

Affected instances

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
any inconvenience caused while we resolve this issue.

item.title: [RBX7][DedicatedServers] - Rack R714B01
item.description:
Mar 28, 11:05 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 28/03/2023 08:18 UTC
End Time : 28/03/2023 10:43 UTC
Root cause : Electrical malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 28, 08:56 UTC
Update - Most of the impacted servers are up anew.
Our technical teams are hands on the few remaining one.

Mar 28, 08:27 UTC
Identified - Start time : 28/03/2023 08:18 UTC
Service impact : Servers in rack R714B01 are down.
Root cause : Electrical malfunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
